N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 59.3 - Requirements

State Regulations
(a) Every bicycle
sold at retail for the first time shall be equipped with either reflective
tires or spoke mounted wide angle reflex reflectors. A reflective tire or a
spoke mounted, wide angle reflex reflector shall meet specifications of the

Consumer Product Safety Commission ( 16 CFR part
1512
). (b) No person shall submit reports or samples
of reflective devices. (c) For the
purposes of this Part, only bicycles with at least two wheels larger than 16
inches (48.26 centimeters) shall be considered bicycles. Notes
